messages.speech:
Students intending to transfer credits earned outside the United States to Century, must have their international transcripts evaluated one of the following:

    World Education Services (WES) International Academic Credential Evaluation
    Educational Credential Evaluators (ECE)

The completed transcript evaluation from WES or ECE must be sent directly to Century's Transfer Student Services Office.

Students should request the "course by course" evaluation and have this sent directly to:

Century College
Transfer Student Services
3300 Century Ave North
White Bear Lake, MN 55110

 

Contact information for WES and ECE is listed below:

World Education Services (WES): Bowling Green Station, P.O. Box 5087, New York, NY 10274-5087

Phone: 1-800-937-3895 Fax: 212-739-6100 www.wes.org

Educational Credential Evaluators (ECE): P.O. Box 514070, Milwaukee, WI 553203

Phone: 414-289-3400 Fax: 414-289-3411 www.ece.org

Once your official WES or ECE evaluation is received at Century College, your credits will be reviewed and applied to your Century academic record. You will be notified via email when your credits from WES or ECE have been processed and included in your Degree Audit Report (DARS). To directly apply these course credits to your specific degree program and/or MnTC Goals 1-10, you must submit an Academic Petition to the Vice President of Academic Affairs for review. You should meet with a Century Counselor to complete the petition.
